CreateBPBrand.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: bma.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateBPBrand
<公共请求参数>

{
    "CompanyName": "企业名称",
    "BrandName": "品牌名称",
    "BrandLogo": "品牌Logo",
    "Phone": "联系电话",
    "License": "营业执照",
    "Authorization": "授权书",
    "TrademarkNames": [
        "商标名称"
    ],
    "Trademarks": [
        "商标证明"
    ],
    "IsTransfers": [
        "1"
    ],
    "Transfers": [
        "转让证明"
    ],
    "ProtectURLs": [
        "qq.com",
        "baidu.com"
    ],
    "ProtectAPPs": [
        "王者荣耀",
        "和平精英"
    ],
    "ProtectOfficialAccounts": [
        "人民日报",
        "广东日报"
    ],
    "ProtectMiniPrograms": [
        "粤省事"
    ]
}
CreateBPBrand.title: 添加品牌
